title: The Grandmama Is The Baby
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, Dustin takes us on a wild Reddit ride.

Black Business of the Week - Santana Caress’ La Clinica De Comida: https://www.gofundme.com/f/la-clinica-de-comida-the-food-clinic?utm_source=customer&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_campaign=m_pd+share-sheet

The Friend Zone Live at Sony Hall!
Thursday, February 13th
Cabaret Style Seating
Full Dinner Menu Available
Tons of special guests!
Tickets: https://www.sonyhall.com/events/the-friend-zone

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Children of Virtue and Vengeance - This episode is brought to you by CHILDREN OF VIRTUE AND VENGEANCE, the instant #1 New York Times bestseller and stunning sequel to Tomi Adeyemi's novel CHILDREN OF BLOOD AND BONE. This sweeping fantasy series is described as "Black Panther" with magic, bringing both black lives matter and black girl magic into a fictional West African world inspired by Tomi's Nigerian roots. Join the phenomenon and read it now!

Away - Away has a range of suitcases made of different materials, a variety of colors, and two carry-on sizes, so there’s something for everyone. And Away’s features include 360° spinner wheels, a laundry bag for dirty clothes, and a built in lock, all in a lightweight suitcase with a durable exterior, making traveling MUCH easier. Away products are designed to last a lifetime, so if any part of your suitcase breaks, they’ll arrange to have it fixed or replaced. There’s also a 100-day trial on everything Away makes, and you can return any non-personalized item for a full refund during that period. To get your suitcase and shop other travel essentials, visit https://www.awaytravel.com/friendzone20

IQ Bar - IQ Bar is that hard-to-find protein bar that’s both healthy AND delicious and suitable for virtually all diets. IQ Bars are the first nutrition bars packed with ingredients that fuel your brain AND body! Each bar has 6 brain nutrients like Omega-3s and Vitamin-E and 10 to 11 grams of plant protein. In fact, 25% of each bar is pure plant-based protein for body health. IQ bars are great for Keto dieters and are ultra-low carb. They’re also Paleo-friendly, vegan, non-GMO and clean-label. And there are so many yummy flavors to choose from like chocolate sea salt, almond butter chip and lemon blueberry. Right now our listeners can get three bars for free. Just pay $3.95 for shipping when you text ZONE to 2-9-0-7-1. This is a special offer exclusively for our listeners.

LOLA - Introducing LOLA, a female-founded company offering a line of organic cotton tampons, pads, liners and biodegradable, all-natural cleansing wipes. Major brands use a mix of synthetic ingredients in their feminine care products and may also be treated with harsh chemical cleansing agents, fragrances or dyes. But LOLA products are 100% organic cotton, offer complete transparency about their ingredients and are easy to feel good about. Plus, LOLA products come in a simple, customizable and flexible subscription – delivering exactly what you need when you need it. You can even tailor your subscription based on product type, absorbency, quantity and frequency. For 30% off your first month’s subscription, visit https://www.mylola.com and enter FRIENDZONE30 when you subscribe.

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://Twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://Facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast

Have a GREAT day!
